page.title: 20EPSOM DOMESDAY/CONTRIBUTORS
page.content: {Data, written contributions and {photographs for this part of the {Domesday Project were provided by {pupils of: Wallace Fields First {School, Kingswood House Preparatory {School and Epsom College.The final {version was written and edited at {Epsom College. Pupils involved included: Kim Patten,Emma Law,Jon Skull,Emma Veit, Mark Edwards,Edward Herten,Andrew Wey,Andrew Groves,Nicholas Lorkin,Paul Banner,R.Bostock,Nigel Ashton,Mark Reaveley,D.Stibbe,R.Knight,August Pascal,Etienne Shui,Keki Madon,Nick Jones,Paul Anderson,Jeffrey Marshall,Marcus Pepperell,Simon Barker,Nicholas Fletcher and many others. The principal teachers involved were: J.Brickwood,P.Brooks,C.Baverstock, E.Huxter and J.R.Moreland.
